title: Pegged in
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, David Atkinson, John Bird and Michael Eaglesome
brief_description: A handful of pegs get up to no good when the house lady leaves them alone with a basket full of freshly dried clothes. This student live animation is an excerise in punchline storytelling with a carefree humour and jazzy soundtrack.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, David Atkinson, John Bird and Michael Eaglesome
